chart.title: Production-based vs. consumption-based energy use
chart.subtitle: Consumption-based (trade-adjusted) energy use measures domestic energy use minus energy used to produce exported goods, plus energy used to produce imported goods. Measured in [terawatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours).
chart.citation: Calculated by Viktoras Kulionis, based on the EXIOBASE v3.8.2 database

consumption_based_energy.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
consumption_based_energy.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Consumption-based” [dataset]. Calculated by Viktoras Kulionis, based on the EXIOBASE v3.8.2 database [original data].

production_based_energy.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
production_based_energy.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Production-based” [dataset]. Calculated by Viktoras Kulionis, based on the EXIOBASE v3.8.2 database [original data].
